content: I would also like to remind you that this conference call will include forward-looking statements, including statements related to our current expectations regarding the continued impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on our business, operations and financial results, including near-term sales in Greater China, our growth and market opportunities and related macro and industry trends, our plans to broaden our offerings, our plans to expand our operations footprint and the expected impact on delivery times, our marketing investments and invest on seasonality pattern, our freight costs, the convergence of year-over-year growth rates at active customers and net sales and our outlook for net sales, gross margin, operating expenses and effective tax rate.
